name: Bikini Heaven
description: Bikini Heaven is a relaxing sliding puzzle game for mature gamers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 587 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 587 MB available space Sound Card: Any
